comment.author: 17735892@N08
comment._content:
Hello,
I'm studying sacral wall art, and came upon this beautiful romanesque frescoes, titled as from Vä Church. I tried to google more about them, but just can't find anything. I would really appreciate if someone could provide me some more sources on that, very detailed images of interior would be a huge hooray! 
thank you

comment.author: 34419668@N08
comment._content: ka+arina: The photo above shows lime stone carvings in the portal arch. Here you can see a photo of a frescoe from the interior (lime painting in the apse vault, by Majestas Domini, 12th century): kmb.raa.se/cocoon/bild/show-image.html?id=16000200065486 This is the only photo of a fresoe in Vä Church in our photo database, hope you appreciate it. A university library would surely help you search for literature on the subject, hopefully you might find books with more photos from Vä Church. Good luck! /Anna B.
